vlive.korean: "민간인이 되니까 좋아요?" "Is it nice to be a civilian?" 듣기 View video Joo won : 주원 입니다 (ft.오랜만이죠!?)
vlive.english: "Is it nice to be a civilian?"

vlive.korean: 민간인이 되셨군요 일반인이 아니라 민간인 맞나? You became a civilian. Not an average person but a civilian, right? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [여름] 요리왕 여룡🍽 EP.02
vlive.english: You became a civilian. Not an average person but a civilian, right?

vlive.korean: 그러면 민간인이 눈이 띄겠죠? that civilian would really stand out, right? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [FULL] 옷장라이브 X 고소현, 정혁, 지숙 - 바캉스룩편 (Closet Live X GOSOHYUN, JUNGHYCK, JISOOK)
vlive.english: that civilian would really stand out, right?

vlive.korean: 누님! 근데 민간인을 이렇게 막 잡아도 되는 거야? Can you lock up a civilian? 듣기 View video 아이엠 (I am) : <사랑, 기억에 머물다> 3-2화 [시작]
vlive.english: Can you lock up a civilian?

vlive.korean: 저는 그냥 민간인의 입장으로 조언을 드리도록 하겠습니다. I will give you advice as a layman. 듣기 View video 10PM : 양재진, 딘딘의 비정상담소 unusual counseling center
vlive.english: I will give you advice as a layman.

examples.korean: At least 300 civilians are unaccounted for after the bombing raids. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 폭격이 있은 후에 최소 300명의 민간인이 행방불명되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: At least 300 civilians are unaccounted for after the bombing raids. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The rebels were responsible for the mass murder of 400 civilians. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 반란군들은 민간인 400명에 대한 대량 살해 책임이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The rebels were responsible for the mass murder of 400 civilians. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Aid agencies are organizing food drops to civilians in the war zone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 원조 단체들에서 그 전쟁 지역의 민간인들에게 보낼 식품 수송 작업을 조직하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Aid agencies are organizing food drops to civilians in the war zone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: donations from private individuals 듣기 Add to Wordbook 민간인 개개인이 낸 기부 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: donations from private individuals Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The government denied that there had been any collateral damage during the bombing raid. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부는 그 폭격 중의 (민간인이나 민간 건물에 대한) 어떤 이차적인 피해 발생도 부인했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government denied that there had been any collateral damage during the bombing raid. Add to Wordbook
